Comment 3: 
In general we can't allow all possible JSON tags here,
since then we'd need yet another escaping mechanism
to avoid the comma used as a separator.
If you have fields with such odd names it might make
sense to decode into a map[string]interface{}
and not try to use the data structure.

That said, I am willing to add ' ' to the list of allowed chars.

Russ
